Talk201:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Look at the time!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I've gotta get a move on. I'll be <clr:0000>heading
east<clr:ffff> soon.<sp:5:1:0> I hope I can find a place where
I can relax...
I still don't have enough <clr:0000>Korok seeds<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> so
get out there and find more for me, 'K?

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>All righty! Next time we meet, let's
dance together!
Talk205:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Hey, you got a sec?<sp:5:0:0> There's something
weird happening up north in
<clr:0000>Korok Forest<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Normally, even when traveling the world,
I can sense my friends back home.

But lately, I haven't been sensing anyone
at all...<sp:5:0:0> All I get now is this ominous
feeling coming from there.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I want to go home to <clr:0000>Korok Forest<clr:ffff> to
check on things, but I'm too scared to
go back right now...<sp:5:0:0> Shalaka...
Talk222:
I'm really worried about my friends and
the <clr:0000>Great Deku Tree<clr:ffff> back home in the
forest...<sp:5:0:0> Do you think they're OK?
Talk206:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I keep sensing this ominous feeling
coming from up <clr:0000>north <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Korok Forest<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>
I hope everyone is OK...<sp:5:0:0> Shalaka...
Talk223:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>You collected so many Korok seeds. You
know what that means?

My maracas<sp:5:0:0> are SUPER happy now!<sp:5:1:0>
♪Shakey-shake<sp:5:1:0> SHAKETY!♪

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Your pouch is as big as it's gonna get at
this point.

But if you feel like it, you should look for
the rest of the Korok seeds.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:CustomHappy_00>♪If you manage to find them all,<sp:5:0:0> come let
me know, OK?♪
Talk207:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Shalaka?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You can see me, can't you?<sp:5:0:0> The
name's Hestu!

<snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm a musician, and I just love my maracas
and dancing. I was away from <clr:0000>Korok
Forest <clr:ffff>on a trip to shaka-shaka!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Shakalo...<sp:5:1:0> I can expand your weapon
stash no further.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>♪Saw-reeeeee!♪
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Shakalo...<sp:5:1:0> I can expand your bow stash
no further.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>♪Saw-reeeeee!♪
Talk101:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>*sniff* *sniff* Do you have a <clr:0000>Korok seed<clr:ffff>?


You do! You got a <clr:0000>Korok seed<clr:ffff> from one
of the forest children!
Talk209:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>I finally made it home to Korok Forest!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>The Koroks told me that icky stuff floating
in the air was making things weird
around here...
<snd:Happy_00>I'm so happy it's gone and that everyone
is better now!<sp:5:0:0>

♪Shaka-kala!♪
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Shakalo...<sp:5:1:0> I can expand your shield stash
no further.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>♪Saw-reeeeee!♪
Talk102:

<clr:0000>Korok seeds<clr:ffff>...
Talk227:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Sometimes I feel like I hear a voice
coming from that well over there...

Maybe just be my imagination.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Shakalo?<sp:5:1:0> It looks like you've expanded
all of your stashes as much as you can.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>It's big! Real big!<sp:5:0:0> A great big pouch!<sp:5:1:0>
♪Niiice!♪
Talk15:

to make your <clr:0000>pouch<clr:ffff> even bigger?
Talk06_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CustomHappy>If you find Korok seeds,<sp:5:0:0> bring them
to me.<sp:5:1:0> In return, I'll expand the size
of your inventory!
Talk181:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>It's you!<sp:5:0:0> We meet again! <sp:5:1:0>It's been a
while, huh?
Talk183:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:CustomHappy_01>So this place was built recently, huh.<sp:5:1:0>
It's got a good vibe, and I figure it's safe
since there are lots of people here.
There are so many monsters all over these
days.<sp:5:0:0> So I'm gonna stay here and relax for
a while.
Oh.<sp:5:1:0> Hang on a minute...
Talk212:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Shaka?!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>You collected all the Korok seeds!
Amazing!<sp:5:1:0> ♪Ama-za-zing, I'ma gonna sing,
amaza-zing!<sp:5:0:0> Super-duper amazing!♪
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>You've maxed all of your stashes.<sp:5:1:0> So let
me give you this, as thanks.
Talk213:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>So? Do you like it?


With that, you can—<sp:5:0:0>wait for it—<sp:5:1:0>watch me
dance whenever you want!

But that's not all!<sp:5:1:0> I can also share a
classic dance with ya.

So!<sp:5:0:0> You just come and find me whenever
you wanna shaka-shaka!
Talk225_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>♪They're selling stuff you can't find in
Korok Forest!♪
